name: Bumpin' Uglies
blurb: Gene Pool Domination: Fling your personalized Ugly through quizzical worlds to bump with other Uglies and make Bumplings!

rewards.reward: Your name in the game credits as part of a visual of a Kickstarter Ugly created using the names of all Kickstarter backers.
Link to online playable teaser of the game, "I Love Bumpin' Uglies" bumper sticker, your name in the Kickstarter Ugly, certificate of backing with a thank you message (delivered digitally.)

Link to online playable teaser of the game, Free 10-pack of Coins (in game currency) to unlock extra game content, your name in the Kickstarter Ugly, certificate of backing with a thank you message (delivered digitally.)

All previous rewards, except Coins Upgrade to Free 25-pack, Limited Edition 11"x17" poster of the Kickstarter Ugly, signed by the whole production team. (International backers, please add $10 for international shipping.)

All previous rewards! And Special Bumpin' Uglies Backer t-shirt in your choice of three colors! Coins Upgrade to Free 25-pack, Limited Edition 11"x17" poster of the Kickstarter Ugly, signed by the whole production team. And a full color bumper sticker with Uglies!  (International backers, please add $10 for international shipping.)

All previous rewards, except Coins Upgrade to Free 50-pack, Exclusive Invitation to Game Testing! You\u2019ll be involved in Alpha and Beta game testing with an online, browser-based full-featured version! You'll also get an MP3 of the Bumpin' Uglies theme music sent digitally!

All previous rewards, except you can swap the regular Backer T-Shirt for the new Bump Me T-Shirt! Free 50-pack of Coins. Get involved in Alpha and Beta game testing with an online, browser-based full-featured version! You'll also get an MP3 of the Bumpin' Uglies theme music sent digitally!

All previous rewards, except Coins Upgrade to 100-pack (wow!), Collector's Edition, autographed, 11"x17" poster of the production\r\nteam's Uglies in a group photo! Plus, Exclusive Invitation to create game content -you\u2019ll submit ideas for worlds, boosts, obstacles, achievements, backgrounds for future releases!! If your original idea is used, you'll get credit in the "Special Thanks To" section of the game credits and permanent recognition on the Bumpin\u2019\r\nUglies website! MP3s of all in-game music, including the first four world packs! (International backers, please add $10 for international shipping)

All previous rewards! Plus Exclusive unlock code that allows you to use any Ugly part in the game, without having to trade Coin or Shinies! Special Bumpin' Uglies Backer t-shirt in your choice of\r\nthree colors! Not only that, you'll get to be even more involved in the process with an exclusive invitation to beta test on a single iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. (International backers, please add\r\n$10 for international shipping)

All Previous Rewards! Plus your VERY OWN, Custom-Designed Ugly in your likeness, delivered digitally, use as a profile image, in your email signature, or however you wish! 11"x17" Poster of your Ugly with signatures of the production team. Plus, your name will be included in the "Special Thanks To" section of the game credits.

LIMITED TIME OFFER! FIRST WEEK ONLY! All Previous Rewards! (Including your very own Ugly) Exclusive UNLOCK Code to use every feature in the game at will! Instant access to\r\nall future world packs! This is normally only available to $1,000 backers!

Free 100-pack of Coins, Your VERY OWN, Custom-Designed Ugly in your likeness, AND You'll be immortalized! Your Ugly's genes (hair, mouth and eyes) will be permanently included in\r\nthe game, animated and available to all players in the Design Your Ugly screen! 11"x17" Poster of your Ugly with signatures of the production team! Exclusive unlock code that allows you to use any Ugly part in the game, without having to trade Coins or Shinies! Special Bumpin' Uglies Backer t-shirt in your choice of three colors! All Invitation Rewards to help create game content! MP3s of all in-game music, including the first four world packs! Limited Edition 11"x17" poster of the Kickstarter Ugly, signed by the whole production team. (International backers, please add $10 for international shipping)

All Previous Rewards! And six 8"x10" photo prints of YOUR Custom-Designed Ugly featured in various silly family photos with the team's Uglies. Your Ugly will appear as an extra in our\r\nprimary promotional trailer!! Exclusive UNLOCK Code to use every feature in the game at will!! Instant access to all future world packs. T-shirt upgrade to the official Bumpin' Uglies ELITE\r\nbacker t-shirt.

All Previous Rewards! And Your Ugly gets featured as the Ugly that is bumped at the end of one of the levels. Further, an entire post-launch world pack will be designed as a place of YOUR\r\nchoosing (your hometown, favorite vacation spot, etc) with a custom designed background that will appear in eight worlds! You will be a guest for the official launch party of Bumpin\u2019 Uglies, we will provide airfare to Minneapolis (21 or older, US residents only!) Oh, and Keith will challenge you to a breakdance contest.
